posts.question: How many guitars could Lou Reed play at once?
posts.author: Burger McDonald
posts.body: I have heard that Lou Reed could play 6 guitars at once. I saw a picture online but I think it mightr have been photoshopped. I'm pretty sure he only had two arms with a hand a piece but maybe I'm wrong? Someone help me!

posts.question: What kind of amp is the best for new age music?
posts.author: Yolanda Squatpump
posts.body: I am starting a new age musical project and I'm wondering what amp would be the best for this? I need it to be really loud. Like, REALLY really loud. Otherwise how can I force all of the people in these loud bars to listen to my soothing music??

posts.question: Were Michael McDonald and Kenny Loggins ever married?
posts.author: Cruz Thrasher
posts.body: I thought I heard once that Michael McDonald and Kenny Loggins got married on a lark when they were vacationing together on some private island. I know it's a longshot but I made a bet with my bookie and I have a lot of money riding on this, I could really use some confirmation.
